description:
Lyra Law is a sexy pianist working in Derrick Pierce's Uptown Lounge, but Lyra wants out of her contract and into the new thriving Downtown scene. Derrick is not about to let her go - in fact he ups the ante and takes Lyra on a whirlwind tour of bondage, BDSM and hardcore anal sex to convince her to stay with him.
Lyra Law is super sexy and beautiful in her submission to Derrick in this movie. This is the story of an elegant lady getting fucked and turned into Derrick's sex slave for the evening - tight rope, rough anal, gags, resistance, dominance and submission at it's finest.
title: The Pianist
